name: Foes.io
summary: Foes is a free browser battle royale game created by Sidney de Vries, the game developer of other popular IO games such as MooMoo, Bloble, Doblons, Driftin, and Vertix.

videos.title: CRAZY Battle DOMINATION and VEHICLE SPLATTERS! - Foes.io Gameplay
